original_text: When the centurion heard that, he went and told the chief captain, saying, Take heed what thou doest: for this man is a Roman.
korean_text: 백부장이 듣고 가서 천부장에게 전하여 이르되 어찌하려 하느냐 이는 로마 시민이라 하니

sentences.original_text: he went and told the chief captain
saying, Take heed what thou doest
for this man is a Roman
